title: Tuesday Post Show (12-14-21)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (12-14-21)
description:
Bobby starts by getting to something he didn't do on the radio show. Eddie sent Bobby a Colgate commercial that made Bobby emotional. Eddie thinks they took Bobby’s story as inspiration for the commercial. Bobby shares a story that makes Lunchbox upset about a delivery driver who is going viral for singing an impromptu song. There is also a trailer for the Death of Gabby Petito. Bobby shares on some TV he’s been watching recently. Amy shares a unique Christmas gift you can give to help sea turtles. We also give an update on Friday’s Christmas Gift Exchange.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
